job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Sr. Generative AI Engineer at Reavant, you will directly contribute to building a Co-Pilot for commercial real estate (CRE) professionals. Reavant's AI Agents can help real estate professionals create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents such as contracts as well as act autonomously to perform otherwise manually time-consuming tasks.

   You'll tackle a mix of research (20%), design (20%), and engineering (60%) challenges to drive our product and service to the next level. Working closely with our hands-on CTO, you will create or adapt functionality with the right balance of quality, performance, speed, and usability.

   As our first technical hire, you will have a significant and visible impact on our product, service, and company., Activities where you will make a difference include:
     * Design and run experiments & evaluations on various Machine Learning tasks (Generative AI, classic NLP or other).
     * Design and build a user workflow, interaction, or widget.
     * Design and engineer an offline or online MLOps workflow.
     * Productize i.e., translate an experimental subprocess from a notebook to the SaaS code base.
     * (Re)architect the solution at all levels and morph it into a better version of itself.
     * Adhere to modern coding standards, write unit tests where necessary.
     * Follow the newest technologies and smartly pick the most promising and relevant ones.

   At this stage, shipping imperfect functionality and learning from its usage by customers is more important than producing perfection. We maximally rely on external services for non-core elements, so we can focus on what really matters.
job_details.full_text:
Generative AI/NLP Engineer (Senior)

As a Sr. Generative AI Engineer at Reavant, you will directly contribute to building a Co-Pilot for commercial real estate (CRE) professionals. Reavant's AI Agents can help real estate professionals create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents such as contracts as well as act autonomously to perform otherwise manually time-consuming tasks.

   You'll tackle a mix of research (20%), design (20%), and engineering (60%) challenges to drive our product and service to the next level. Working closely with our hands-on CTO, you will create or adapt functionality with the right balance of quality, performance, speed, and usability.

   As our first technical hire, you will have a significant and visible impact on our product, service, and company., Activities where you will make a difference include:
     * Design and run experiments & evaluations on various Machine Learning tasks (Generative AI, classic NLP or other).
     * Design and build a user workflow, interaction, or widget.
     * Design and engineer an offline or online MLOps workflow.
     * Productize i.e., translate an experimental subprocess from a notebook to the SaaS code base.
     * (Re)architect the solution at all levels and morph it into a better version of itself.
     * Adhere to modern coding standards, write unit tests where necessary.
     * Follow the newest technologies and smartly pick the most promising and relevant ones.

   At this stage, shipping imperfect functionality and learning from its usage by customers is more important than producing perfection. We maximally rely on external services for non-core elements, so we can focus on what really matters.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building applications and user-facing systems powered by Generative AI and NLP. Core responsibilities include designing user workflows, productizing experimental subprocesses into SaaS, and working with AI agents, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Design and run experiments & evaluations on various Machine Learning tasks (Generative AI, classic NLP or other)
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the core process of creating, training, or adapting machine learning models, specifically mentioning Generative AI and NLP tasks.

phrases: building a Co-Pilot for commercial real estate (CRE) professionals
Reavant's AI Agents can help real estate professionals create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents
Design and build a user workflow, interaction, or widget
Productize i.e., translate an experimental subprocess from a notebook to the SaaS code base
(Re)architect the solution at all levels and morph it into a better version of itself
Adhere to modern coding standards, write unit tests where necessary
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the development of user-facing applications, integration of AI features into software, building user interfaces, and general software engineering practices necessary for production systems.

phrases: Design and engineer an offline or online MLOps workflow
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions the design and engineering of MLOps workflows, which is a key component of deploying and maintaining AI models in production.

phrases: building a Co-Pilot for commercial real estate (CRE) professionals
help real estate professionals create, parse, interpret, and interrogate documents
act autonomously to perform otherwise manually time-consuming tasks
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business domain (commercial real estate) and how AI can be applied to solve specific business problems and automate tasks for professionals.

phrases: Follow the newest technologies and smartly pick the most promising and relevant ones
shipping imperfect functionality and learning from its usage by customers is more important than producing perfection
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to stay updated with new technologies and adapt to learnings from customer usage, reflecting a dynamic and evolving field.
